The Knight of Despair
collection.openText: All that remained was the hollow pride of a weathered knight.

specialTipSize.specialTip: The first employee who completes the work with Good results will receive $0‘s blessing. (From then on, the employee will be named O-01-73-1.)
O-01-73-1 could only do suppression as work. Also, thanks to the blessing, Red, White, and Black type damage dealt to O-01-73-1 will be reduced to half. Only Pale type damage will be doubled.
Blessing dissipates when O-01-73-1 dies or panics. After the blessing disappears, a new blessing can be given to another employee.
When O-01-73-1 panics and it escapes from the Containment room. The same results happen when O-01-73-1 dies.
